summary: Rename the 'external dependencies' feature to 'sinks' to better reflect its actual functionality. The current name is misleading because this mechanism cannot be used to return values into the workflow.
userImpact: Users will have a more accurate understanding of what the external dependencies/sinks feature can and cannot do based on its corrected name.
rootCause: The original 'external dependencies' naming was inaccurate and did not reflect the actual capability constraints of the feature.
proposedFix: Rename 'external dependencies' to 'sinks' throughout the SDK.
resolutionDetails: Feature was renamed from 'external dependencies' to 'sinks' to accurately reflect its purpose.
keyQuote: The name is no longer accurate because this mechanism cannot be used to return values into the workflow
